headline: Steel Dynamics Announces Completion of Notes Offering and Redemption Call for its 5.000% Notes Due 2026
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ/GS: STLD) announced today that it has consummated the sale of $650 million aggregate principal amount of 4.000% Notes due 2028 (the "2028 Notes") as well as reopened and consummated the sale of an additional $150 million aggregate principal amount of 5.250% Notes due 2035 (the "Additional 2035 Notes" and, together with the 2028 Notes, the "Notes"). The Additional 2035 Notes were issued at a price of 101.443% of their principal amount, an implied yield of 5.053%. The
